Client.description: Spotify Client class to interact with spotify api! Remember client.user can only be used when you are using a scoped token.

search.description: Search through various types. But will not have advanced option.

get.description: Returns a new api auth token
parameters: Your client secret and client id in object form

refresh.description: Refreshes and gets a new authorization token at the same time can make a new scoped access_token by using code query sent by spotify authorization.
parameters: Your client id, client secret and redirect uri in object form
Your client id, client secret and redirect uri in object form

Util.description: Utility class. All utility methods are present here.

hexToRgb.description: Coverts hex code to rgb number array

fetch.description: Quick method to fetch from spotify api. Will return the data required or will throw error if bad request.

getURIData.description: Returns the spotify uri data requested

getCodeImage.description: Returns the code image url by the spotify uri

Browse.description: All browse endpoints in the form of class

getCategory.description: Returns the information about the category by the id provided.

getCategoryPlaylists.description: Returns the playlists about the category by the id provided.

categories.description: Returns the list of all categories.

featuredCategories.description: Returns the list of all featured categories.

newReleases.description: Returns the list of all new releases.

Artist.description: All artist api endpoints in the form of class

search.description: Returns search info by the query and options provided
parameters: Options to help your data collection better!

getAlbums.description: Returns the list of albums by the Spotify Artist by the artist id
parameters: Options to help your data collection better!

topTracks.description: Returns the top tracks of the Spotify Artist by the artist id
parameters: Options to help your data collection better!

relatedArtists.description: Returns list of related artists of the Spotify Artist by the artist id
parameters: Options to help your data collection better!

Album.description: All album api endpoints in the form of class

parameters: Options to help your data collection better!

getTracks.description: Returns album tracks by album id
parameters: Options to help your data collection better!

Playlist.description: All playlist api endpoints in the form of class

getTracks.description: Returns the tracks of the spotify playlist
parameters: Options to help your data collection better!

getCoverImage.description: Returns the cover image of the playlist by id

follows.description: Verify if the user follows the playlist
parameters: Id of the users or user. If users use array as [userid1, userid2] else if one user just use userid1

User.description: All user api endpoints in the form of class

get.description: Returns the spotify user playlists by id

Track.description: All track api endpoints in the form of class

parameters: Options to help your data collection better!

audioFeatures.description: Returns the audio features by id

audioAnalysis.description: Returns the audio analysis of the track by id

Episode.description: All episode api endpoints in the form of class

Show.description: All show api endpoints in the form of class

get.description: Returns the show information by id

getEpisodes.description: Returns the show episodes by id

UserClient.description: All current user api endpoints in the form of class. Remember you need a scoped token to access current user api endpoints.

player.description: User player. Most of the player api is available only for spotify premium users only

parameters: Making advanced option to true will return you the codeImage and dominantColor with it
Url where the user will be redirect after the login
The scopes you need from the user while authorizing in a string in the format of "scope1 scope2"
Code query sent by the spotify authorization. You can use the refresh_token also to get a new access_token.
This redirect uri would not actually redirect you. This is only for validation. You need to enter the same uri/url used in the authorization link or Auth.build
Time in which the access_token expires
Token which you can use to refresh in options.code and get a new token using Auth.refresh method
All the query parameters in object form
By default the fetch methods uses GET method. You can set your own method
